commands.name: az servicebus namespace authorization-rule create
commands.summary: Create an authorization rule for a namespace.
examples: az servicebus namespace authorization-rule create --resource-group myresourcegroup --namespace-name mynamespace --name myauthorule --rights Send Listen

commands.name: az servicebus namespace authorization-rule delete
examples: az servicebus namespace authorization-rule delete --resource-group myresourcegroup --namespace-name mynamespace --name myauthorule

commands.name: az servicebus namespace authorization-rule list
commands.summary: List the authorization rules for a namespace.
examples: az servicebus namespace authorization-rule list --resource-group myresourcegroup --namespace-name mynamespace

commands.name: az servicebus namespace authorization-rule show
commands.summary: Get an authorization rule for a namespace by rule name.
examples: az servicebus namespace authorization-rule show --resource-group myresourcegroup --namespace-name mynamespace --name myauthorule

commands.name: az servicebus namespace authorization-rule update
commands.summary: Update an authorization rule for a namespace.
commands.syntax:
az servicebus namespace authorization-rule update [--add]
                                                  [--authorization-rule-name]
                                                  [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                  [--ids]
                                                  [--namespace-name]
                                                  [--remove]
                                                  [--resource-group]
                                                  [--rights]
                                                  [--set]
                                                  [--subscription]
examples: az servicebus namespace authorization-rule update --resource-group myresourcegroup --namespace-name mynamespace --name myauthorule --rights Send
